problems.title: Palindrome Permutation (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a string s, return true if a permutation of the string could form a palindrome and false otherwise.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
code

Sample Output
False

Explanation: No permutation of "code" can form a palindrome.

Sample Input
aab

Sample Output
True

Explanation: "aba" is a palindrome permutation of "aab".

Sample Input
carerac

Sample Output
True

Explanation: "racecar" is a palindrome permutation of "carerac".
problems.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 5000
s consists of only lowercase English letters.
hintsList: A palindrome can have at most one character with odd frequency.
Use bit manipulation to track character frequencies efficiently.
